```{r}
#| include: false
library(readr)
library(reticulate)
library(dplyr)
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(vegabrite)
library(base64enc)
library(vegalite)
```


```{r}
#| include: false
percentage <- read.csv("/rprojects/jc253/VisualizeDiversity/docs/posts/Objectivity/StudentFacultyPercentage.csv")

percentage_minority <- percentage |>
  mutate(minority_percent = AHANA_percent + International_percent)

percentage_dif <- percentage |>
  mutate(gender_ratio = Female_percent/Male_percent)
```

```{r}
US_minority_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300, title = "US Racial Minority Representation at Calvin")|>
  vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE, domainMid = 1997, domainMax = 2019)|>
  vl_encode_y("AHANA_percent:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_y(domainMax = 30)|>
  vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "AHANA_percent"))|>
  vl_add_data(percentage_minority)
US_minority_plot
```
```{r}
minority_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300, title = "International and Racial Minority Representation at Calvin (%)")|>
  vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE, domainMid = 1997, domainMax = 2019)|>
  vl_encode_y("minority_percent:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "AHANA_percent", "International_percent", "minority_percent"))|>
  vl_add_data(percentage_minority)
minority_plot
```
```{r}
race_plot <- vl_hconcat(US_minority_plot, minority_plot)
race_plot
```
AHANA: students or faculty members who identify themselves as African-, Hispanic-, Asian-, or Native-Americans and are U.S. Citizens or permanent residents of the U.S.

```{r}
gender_dif_plot <- vl_chart()|>
  vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|>
  vl_encode_y("gender_ratio:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_y(zero = FALSE)|>
  vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_add_properties(title = list(text = "Gender Ratio in Calvin Representations", subtitle = "Gender Ratio = Percentage Female / Percentage Male"))|>
  vl_add_data(percentage_dif)
gender_dif_plot

reference <- vl_chart()|>
  vl_mark_line(color = "black")|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|>
  vl_encode_y(value = 1)|>
  vl_scale_y(rangeMin = 0.3, rangeMax = 1.4)|>
  vl_add_data(percentage_dif)
reference
```



```{r}
line <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 300)|>
  vl_mark_bar()|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_x(zero = FALSE)|>
  vl_encode_y("Female_percent:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_y2("Male_percent:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_facet_column("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_add_data(percentage)
line
```

```{r}
percentage <- percentage|>
  pivot_longer(cols = c("Female_percent", "Male_percent"), values_to = "Percentage", names_to = "Gender")
percentage_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 200)|>
  vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q",title = "")|>
  vl_encode_y("Percentage:Q")|>
  vl_encode_color("Gender:N")|>
  vl_facet_column("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year", "Gender", "Percentage"))|>
  vl_add_data(percentage)
percentage_plot
```

```{r}

gender_percentage_plot <- vl_chart(width = 300, height = 200)|>
  vl_mark_line(point = TRUE)|>
  vl_encode_x("year:Q",title = "")|>
  vl_encode_y("Percentage:Q", title = "")|>
  vl_scale_y(zero = FALSE)|>
  vl_facet_column("Gender:N", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_color("student / faculty:N", title = "")|>
  vl_encode_tooltip_array(list("year","student / faculty", "Gender","Percentage"))|>
  vl_add_properties(title = list(text = "Compare Faculty & Student Representtation: Gender",
                                subtitle = " "))|>
  vl_add_data(percentage)
gender_percentage_plot
```

Student body has more female representation than faculty. 
However, female faculty representation is slightly increasing throughout the recorded years.
